text: CRAN release: 2019-01-11 list_any(), list_csv(), list_tsv(), load_csv(), load_tsv() now use readr. makes reading data faster safer. Listed dataframes now converted tibbles. Users longer need call tibble::as_tibble(). New load_*() functions load file directory environment.
